price: Ɔkaa sε: ”Onyankopͻn na mede m’akosεm ne m’awerεhoͻ to N’anim, na menim adeε a monnim wͻ Nyankopͻn hͻ.”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَشۡكُواْ بَثِّي وَحُزۡنِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā ashkū bathī waḥuz'nī ilā al-lahi wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
